programme.title: Personality in politics
programme.short_synopsis: The revelations of the televised debate between Al Gore and Ross Perot.
programme.medium_synopsis: Examining the surprising result of a debate between the 'boring' Al Gore and 'sassy' Ross Perot and how the reputations of politicians are formed by their public personas.
